buddy_profile.name: Boon Siong Wee
buddy_profile.title: CEO - Aeterni.eco
buddy_profile.introduction: I am an IMCS (Institute of Management Consultants) Registered Management Consultant with over 25 years of experience in various industries including government, financial services, info-comm and sustainability. I am the CEO of Aeterni.eco, specialising in sustainability strategy including reporting, carbon footprint for corporates, products and services, green finance and sustainability training. I have been involved in projects for entities like MAS, SGX, DBS, UOB, ICICI, PSA, SingPost, Philips, Sentosa, etc.
credentials: Mathematics at Cambridge University (triple first class)
Diploma in Actuarial Science from Institute of Actuaries
buddy_profile.experience: 25+ years in government, financial services, info-comm and sustainability
buddy_profile.how_to_help: I am happy to help out and get more people to understand the topic, to get them on board the idea of sustainability. In terms of experience sharing, I would love to share about the pains and joys in projects we have done.
buddy_profile.sustainability_motivation: I joined the sustainability movement in 2017, as I feel that it is important that everyone can continue to co-exist in this ever-shrinking world.
buddy_profile.organizational_responsibilities: I have several sustainability reports for listed and non-listed companies in Singapore and elsewhere. For example, I have done product and corporate carbon reporting for MAS, DBS, SGX, and Sentosa amongst others. I have also done green finance frameworks for big MNCs and banks. Additionally, I have conducted trainings for various organisations like the IHLs, SBC, GCNS etc.
buddy_profile.challenges_and_solutions: Raising awareness on and understanding a constantly evolving topic is always a challenge. It is important that we ground ourselves in the basics of the domain, think logically and analytically, and constantly read up and be informed of changes in the area.
buddy_profile.proudest_achievement: I am most proud of getting to know my customers better, and helping them understand themselves and improve from there.
company_services: Carbon footprint for corporates, products and services
